mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_NAME, NICK_NAME, USER_PHONE_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_EMAIL) VALUES (#{USER_NAME}, #{NICK_NAME}, #{USER_PHONE_NUMBER}, #{USER_ID}, #{USER_PWD}, #{USER_EMAIL})

INSERT INTO SELLER (SELLER_NAME, SELLER_NICK_NAME, SELLER_PHONE_NUMBER, SELLER_ID, SELLER_PWD, SELLER_EMAIL) VALUES (#{SELLER_NAME}, #{SELLER_NICK_NAME}, #{SELLER_PHONE_NUMBER}, #{SELLER_ID}, #{SELLER_PWD}, #{SELLER_EMAIL})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SELLER WHERE SELLER_ID = #{SELLER_ID}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_IDX FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND USER_PWD = #{USER_PWD}
SELECT SELLER_IDX FROM SELLER WHERE SELLER_ID = #{SELLER_ID} AND SELLER_PWD = #{SELLER_PWD}
